comment.author: 69662531@N05
comment._content:
CWGC has this:

ABEL, DAVID STUART

Rank: Private
Service No: 3808
Date of Death: 12/10/1916
Age: 20
Regiment/Service: South African Infantry 2nd Regt.
Panel Reference Pier and Face 4 C.
Memorial THIEPVAL MEMORIAL
Additional Information:
Son of William Abel, of South Ley Lodge, Kintore, Aberdeenshire, Scotland.

comment.author: 64288588@N05
comment._content: The South African Infantry Brigade Rollcall for Delville Wood shows that he was MIA in front the Butte of Warlencourt (Somme) www.delvillewood.com/rolcallA.htm www.delvillewood.com/cemeteries/thiepval%20memorial%202nd...

comment.author: 64288588@N05
comment._content: This Diary of a South Africam Private, 2nd Battalin South African Infantry [sic] is useful www.cairogang.com/escaped/king/1916-1917/1916-1917.html

comment.author: 64288588@N05
comment._content: South Leylodge Farmhouse is now an art gallery (or airt gallery) www.theairtgallery.co.uk/
